profile.name: Daniel Martí
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | @cue-lang @cue-labs
profile.summary: Highly motivated and experienced software engineer with a strong passion for open-source development, Go programming language, and CUE. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions and collaborating with the community.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer | @cue-lang @cue-labs
description: Led the development of several notable projects, including go-toml and cue.
Contributed to the growth and maintenance of the CUE project.
Collaborated with the community on bug reports and discussions.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed and maintained several open-source projects, including garble-fork.
Participated in the development of go-toml.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated several open-source projects, including cue.
Contributed to the growth of the CUE community.
